original_title: The Warwick Rowers - WR18 The Spain Film
overview: The Warwick Rowers Charity Calendar making of films are rightly famous. Shot and edited by a world-class director/editor since 2012, In this second film, in Spain, is shot in an extraordinary private garden that overlooks the Straits of Gibraltar, where the Atlantic Ocean meets the Mediterranean sea.  As well as the dramatic and unique location, we are delighted that we were able to bring a total of twelve rowers to Spain this year.  The privacy of the garden, the warmth of the Mediterranean summer and the camaraderie between such a large group of rowers make this a film like nothing weâ€™ve made before.
tagline: Film follows 2018 Calendar shoot in Spain
title: The Warwick Rowers - WR18 The Spain Film
